travelTips.title: Getting There
travelTips.content: The event is located in the Negev Desert. Coordinate transportation with other camp members to reduce environmental impact.

travelTips.title: What to Bring
travelTips.content: Desert survival essentials: water, sun protection, warm clothes for nights, dust mask, and your camp contribution.

travelTips.title: Arrival Times
travelTips.content: Early arrival (Monday-Tuesday) is encouraged for camp setup. Please coordinate with camp leadership.

ticketsFAQ.question: Do I need a ticket to join BABA ZMAN?
ticketsFAQ.answer: Yes, all participants need a valid Midburn ticket. We can help coordinate ticket acquisition through various departments.

ticketsFAQ.question: What if I don't have a ticket yet?
ticketsFAQ.answer: Register with us anyway! We'll help connect you with ticket opportunities and keep you informed of availability.

ticketsFAQ.question: Are there different ticket types?
ticketsFAQ.answer: Midburn offers various ticket tiers and payment options. Check the official Midburn website for current pricing and availability.

ticketsFAQ.question: Can I get a refund?
ticketsFAQ.answer: Ticket refund policies are set by Midburn organization. Camp-specific contributions may have different terms.
